input.sentences: we have a big day ahead of us | so the 1st thing that must be done is my hair .
of course | your feet have to look great as well .
flowers | flowers and more flowers ? who does not love flowers ?
and this is the finished product ! whew | the work was worth it !
my beautiful baby looking gorgeous in her dress .
output.sentences: For her weddin she did her own hair.
They lined up all the matching shoes for the bridesmaids.
The whole family came to town for the wedding.
The girls loved to dance in their fancy dresses.
